pkgmetadata.longdescription: Child Anthropometry z-Score Calculator // A tool for calculating z-scores and centiles for weight-for-age, length/height-for- age, weight-for-length/height, BMI-for-age, head circumference- for-age, age circumference-for-age, subscapular skinfold-for- age, triceps skinfold-for-age based on the WHO Child Growth Standards.
